title: Joska Phase-2
description: Experience the vibrant outskirts of Nairobi on this promising plot in Joska, Machakos County. Covering roughly 0.125 acres of fertile soil suited for residential development or small-scale farming, it offers excellent connectivity via Kangundo Road to the city center. Close to schools, markets, and emerging amenities in this fast-growing area. Perfect for building your family home or a smart investment in Kenya's expanding urban fringe.
